snippet: Strict new firearm regulations took effect in California today after a last-minute rush to meet a registration deadline for military-style semiautomatic weapons.    The laws ban the sale of 56 types of semiautomatic weapons and put into effect a 1...
lead_paragraph: Strict new firearm regulations took effect in California today after a last-minute rush to meet a registration deadline for military-style semiautomatic weapons. The laws ban the sale of 56 types of semiautomatic weapons and put into effect a 15-day waiting period for the purchase of rifles and shotguns, a precaution that had previously applied only to handguns.

headline.main: California Rush to Comply With Firearms Law

byline.original: By SETH MYDANS, Special to The New York Times
